name: haxbotron
description: Haxbotron is a headless host server application for Haxball.
author: dapucita

scripts.install:packages: npm run install:packages:core && npm run install:packages:db
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:db
scripts.build:core: cd core && NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' npm run build
scripts.build:force: cd core && NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' npx tsc --noEmitOnError false && NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' npm run build:bot && NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' npm run build:web && cd ../db && npx tsc --noEmitOnError false
